course_title: Spec Stud in Classical Culture: History of Rome
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 10 / Seats Avail: 4Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same HIST 302 1)
Instructor is newly-hired Prof. Jinyu Liu, Betty Gage Holland Professor of Roman History.
History of Rome and its civilization from earliest times to the accession of Constantine. Traces Rome's evolution from small town to world empire and the development of the arts and manners of the Greco-Roman world. Explores how the locals and the ordinary Romans react to Rome's expansion.
course_description: Topic changes to meet current interest of students and faculty. Course may be repeated for credit as topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 5648, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: J. Liu, Status: Open
